com.linecorp.armeria.server

Class ChainedVirtualHostBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.server.ChainedVirtualHostBuilder

  • public final class ChainedVirtualHostBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a new VirtualHost.

    This class can only be created through the ServerBuilder.withDefaultVirtualHost() or ServerBuilder.withVirtualHost(String) method of the ServerBuilder.

    Call and() method can also return to ServerBuilder.

    See Also:
    ServerBuilder, PathMapping, VirtualHostBuilder
